2. A female must remove the unwanted hair (below her navel and armpits), can we do it by using shaving blade or we have to do only by scissors. 3. What is the meaning of name 'AISHA'.

1. Recite Durood Shareef excessively. Thereafter, recite 'Rabb inniy maghloobun fantasir'.
